name: Koala Jump! (v2.0)
description:
VERSION 2.0 IS OUT! Check out the devlog at the bottom of this page to find out more!!

Welcome to my newest game, Koala Jump!

I am updating the game a lot, so make you to check back occassionally!

╚»★«╝ Controls/Instructions: ╚»★«╝

[Mouse Pointer] Move Koala (ᴛʜɪꜱ ɪꜱ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱᴀᴍᴇ ꜰᴏʀ ᴍᴏʙɪʟᴇ & ᴄᴏᴍᴘᴜᴛᴇʀ)

■ Dodge the obstacles!

■ Don't fall off!

■ Stay on the platforms for as long as you can to beat the World High Score!

Enjoy!
